title: Mr. Clorox, Kem Interview, Halle Berry and more.
itunes:title: Mr. Clorox, Kem Interview, Halle Berry and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Often imitated but never duplicated. Happy Friday. There are 4 Atlanta residents that will not be going anywhere. There is a legendary comeback that is made with Fool #2. Soul singer stops by to discuss new music and more. Rodzilla shows concern for his North Korean friend. 45 is showing bipolar tendencies. What are the things that home school teachers are seeing in the house? Did Michael Jackson ask Halle Berry out on a date back in the day? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve's message is simple. STAY HOME!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
